title: Basketball strategy for girls
creator_credit: Educational Productions and Young America Films
brief_description: The use of planned strategic play on the basketball court. Demonstrates offensive moves such as fakes, rolls, cuts, variances of pace, the figure eight and defence strategies such as player to player and basic zone, shifting zone, triangle, and diagonal defences.
description: The use of planned strategic play on the basketball court. Demonstrates offensive moves such as fakes, rolls, cuts, variances of pace, the figure eight and defence strategies such as player to player and basic zone, shifting zone, triangle, and diagonal defences.
